headline: Albemarle Announces Idling of Operations at Kemerton Processing Plant
summary: ALB idles Kemerton Train 1, citing lithium price volatility and aims for an EBITDA boost by Q2 2026 with no hit to sales volumes.

headline: Albemarle Corporation (ALB) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Albemarle (ALB) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.

headline: BASFY Expands Manufacturing Presence in India With Added Capacity
summary: BASF boosts Mangalore facility with new dispersions line, enhancing supply security and targeting India's paints, construction and packaging growth.

headline: Top U.S. General Joins the Fight for Rare Earth Security
summary: For years, the US depended on foreign suppliers of rare earth elements, but an all-American company is now looking to bring the entire rare earth supply chain back home
